revision.text:
{{BLP sources|date=July 2014}} {{Use mdy dates|date=April 2014}} {{Infobox ice hockey player | name = Marko Virtanen | image = | caption = | image_size = 225px | played_for = '''''[[SM-liiga]]'''''
[[JYP Jyväskylä]]
'''''[[Swedish Hockey League|Elitserien]]'''''
[[Färjestad BK]]
[[Södertälje SK]] | position = [[Winger (ice hockey)|Right Wing]] | height_ft = 5 | height_in = 10 | weight_lb = 181 | shoots = Left | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1968|12|10}} | birth_place = [[Jyväskylä]], [[Finland]] | draft = Undrafted | career_start = 1988 | career_end = 2000 }} '''Marko Virtanen''' (born December 10, 1968) is a [[Finland|Finnish]] former professional [[ice hockey]] player. He is currently the head coach of [[JYP Jyväskylä]] in the Finnish [[Liiga]]. Virtanen assumed the position of head coach for JYP with the [[2013–14 Liiga season]].{{cite web | url=http://www.jypliiga.fi/uutiset/marko-virtanen-jypin-paavalmentajaksi-2013-2015 | title=Marko Virtanen JYPin päävalmentajaksi 2013 – 2015 | publisher=Jypliiga | accessdate=25 July 2014 | deadurl=yes | archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150316112244/http://www.jypliiga.fi/uutiset/marko-virtanen-jypin-paavalmentajaksi-2013-2015 | archivedate=March 16, 2015 | df=mdy-all }} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{Eliteprospects}} *{{hockeydb|34132|Marko Virtanen}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Virtanen, Marko}} [[Category:1968 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Färjestad BK players]] [[Category:Finnish ice hockey coaches]] [[Category:Finnish ice hockey players]] [[Category:JYP Jyväskylä players]] [[Category:Södertälje SK players]] {{Finland-icehockey-player-stub}}

page.title: 2014–15 Northern Illinois Huskies men's basketball team

revision.comment: Rescuing 1 sources and tagging 0 as dead. #IABot (v2.0beta14)
revision.text:
{{Infobox NCAA team season |Mode = Basketball |Year = 2014–15 |Prev year = 2013–14 |Next year = 2015–16 |Team = Northern Illinois Huskies |Image = Northern Illinois Huskies basketball wordmark.svg |ImageSize = 250 |Conference = Mid-American Conference |Division = West Division |ShortConference = MAC |CoachRank = |APRank = |Record = 14–16 |ConfRecord = 8–10 |HeadCoach = [[Mark Montgomery (basketball)|Mark Montgomery]] |HCYear = 4th |AsstCoach1 = Jon Borovich |AsstCoach2 = Lou Dawkins |AsstCoach3 = Jason Larson |AsstCoach4 = |StadiumArena = [[Convocation Center (Northern Illinois University)|Convocation Center]] |Champion = |BowlTourney = |BowlTourneyResult = }} {{2014–15 Mid-American Conference men's basketball standings}} The '''2014–15 Northern Illinois Huskies men's basketball team''' represented [[Northern Illinois University]] during the [[2014–15 NCAA Division I men's basketball season]]. The Huskies, led by fourth year head coach [[Mark Montgomery (basketball)|Mark Montgomery]], played their home games at the [[Convocation Center (Northern Illinois University)|Convocation Center]] as members of the West Division of the [[Mid-American Conference]]. They finished the season 14–16, 8–10 in MAC play to finish in a tie for fourth place in the West Division. They lost in the first round of the [[2015 MAC Men's Basketball Tournament|MAC Tournament]] to Akron. ==Roster== {{CBB roster/Header|year=2014|team=Northern Illinois Huskies|teamcolors=y|high_school=yes}} {{CBB roster/Player|first=Pete|last=Rakocevic|num=0|pos=C|ft=6|in=11|lbs=245|class=sr|rs=y|home=[[Chicago|Chicago, IL]]|high_school=[[Wilbraham & Monson Academy]]
